title: AMD launches Radeon Super Resolution for games, FSR 2.0 coming soon
content:
AMD has just released AMD Softwaare Adrenaline Edition 2022, the latest version of its drivers and software for PCs with AMD GPUs. This new version of the driver comes with a major new feature, AMD Radeon Super Resolution, based on the FidelityFX Super Resolution (FSR) technology. Unlike AMD FSR, Radeon Super Resolution is an in-driver

The post AMD launches Radeon Super Resolution for games, FSR 2.0 coming soon appeared first on xda-developers.
description: AMD has released the latest version of its driver software, adding support for Radeon Super Resolution upscaling in AMD RDNA graphics cards.
